Command.name: Check My Calendar
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Check","My","Schedule" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Contacts
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Contacts" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Journal
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Journal" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Notes
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Notes" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Phone Book
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Contacts" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Saved Mail
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Saved","Mail" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Schedule
Command.content: Sub Main ''TTSPlayString "opening your schedule" Wait 2 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Calendar" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Sent Items
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Sent","Items" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Tasks
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Tasks" End Sub

Command.name: Close Document
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%fc" End Sub

Command.name: Close File
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%fc" End Sub

Command.name: Copy All
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Copy","Everything" End Sub

Command.name: Copy Over Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Down}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Tab}" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v{Enter}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete Line
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Home}+{End}{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Exit <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{F4} "+ListVar1+"" End Sub

Command.name: Run Program
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture Window
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" End Sub

Command.name: Tab <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Refresh
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{F5}" End Sub

Command.name: Continue
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Double Left Click
Command.content: Sub Main ShiftKey 2,1 ButtonClick 1,2 ShiftKey 2,0 End Sub

Command.name: Select <Direction> <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Select <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Words
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Close <1to20> Documents
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) Wait 1 SendKeys "^s%fc" Next End Sub

Command.name: Close <1to20> Files
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) Wait 1 SendKeys "^s%fc" Next End Sub

Command.name: Option <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}{Enter 2}" Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "Option #1" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "Option #2" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "Option #3" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "Option #4" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "Option #5" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "Option #6" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "Option #7" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "Option #8" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "Option #9" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "Option #10" SendKeys "{Enter}" HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Schedule An Appointment On <MonthList> <DateList> At <TimeList> <AmPm>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "switch to Outlook" Wait 1 SendKeys "^+a" Wait 1 SendKeys "%t" + ListVar1 + " " + ListVar2 + "{Tab}" + ListVar3 + ListVar4 + "%u" 'TTSPlayString "subject" HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: Tab Cap
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Tab}" HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: What Time Is It
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 ShellExecute "Wordpad" Wait 1 HeardWord "Time","Stamp" Wait 2 SendKeys "+{Home}" Wait 2 HeardWord "set","size","72" Wait 2 HeardWord "read","that" Wait 3 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Copy Everything
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a^c" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Right}" Wait 0.5 'TTSPlayString "copied" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Space}n" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Transcribe
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgTranscribe,0,,0) End Sub

Command.name: Set <FontFace> <FontSize> <FontStyle>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Times" then param1 = "Times New Roman" if ListVar1 = "Courier" then param1 = "Courier New" if ListVar1 = "Arial" then param1 = "Arial" if ListVar1 = "Comic" then param1 = "Comic Sans MS" if ListVar1 = "Impact" then param1 = "Impact" if ListVar1 = "Garamond" then param1 = "Garamond" if ListVar1 = "Kaufmann" then param1 = "Kaufmann BT" if ListVar1 = "Monotype" then param1 = "Monotype Corsiva" if ListVar3 = "Plain" then param3 = "Regular" if ListVar3 = "Plain text" then param3 = "Regular" if ListVar3 = "Underline" then param3 = "%u" if ListVar3 = "Italics" then param3 = "Italic" if ListVar3 = "Bold" then param3 = "bold" SendKeys "%of%f" + param1 + "%s" + ListVar2 + "%y" + ListVar3 + "~{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Full Screenshot To Printer
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Prtsc}" ' Using Dragon Pad will print the screen full size ' if you want to on a page try something like WordPad ' using ShellExecute"WordPad" as your next line EmulateRecognition"Start DragonPad" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^p" Wait 0.2 SendKeys"~" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Full ScreenShot To File
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Prtsc}" ' Use something like WordPad if you want the screenshot on one page ' so line below would be ShellExecute "WordPad" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" 'TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\Caps-On" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Left Click
Command.content: Sub Main ButtonClick 1,1 End Sub

Command.name: Check My Inbox
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 1 SendKeys "^y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}inbox" Wait .1 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{F9}" End Sub

Command.name: Letters <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main t1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) if t1 = "backslash" Then t1 = "\" if t1 = "space" Then t1 = " " SendKeys t1 End Sub

Command.name: Letters <myalphabet> <myalphabet>
Command.content: Sub Main ' t1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) t2 = Mid$(ListVar2,1,InStr(ListVar2, "\")-1) if t1 = "backslash" Then t1 = "\" if t2 = "backslash" Then t2 = "\" if t1 = "space" Then t1 = " " if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " SendKeys t1+t2 End Sub

Command.name: Restart Windows
Command.content: Sub Main 'TTSPlayString "restart windows?" If MsgBox("Windows will now be restarted, before clicking Ok you should make " _ + "sure that all necessary files are saved and the Dragon user profile is " _ + "saved if required", vbOkCancel ) = vbOk Then ShellExecute "shutdown.exe -r -t 00 -f" End If End Sub

Command.name: Shutdown Windows
Command.content: Sub Main 'TTSPlayString "Shut down Windows?" If MsgBox("Windows will now be shutdown, before clicking Ok you should make " _ + "sure that all necessary files are saved and the Dragon user profile is " _ + "saved if required", vbOkCancel ) = vbOk Then ShellExecute "shutdown.exe -s -t 00 -f" End If End Sub

Command.name: Go <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: Wheel <Direction> <1to20>
Command.content: Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Up" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Down" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Right" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Left" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) End Select End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG To Printer
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ' Using WordPad will fit the screenshot on one page ' if you want the full size screen print you could try ' something like ShellExecute"MSPaint" as your next line ShellExecute"WordPad" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^p" Wait 0.2 SendKeys"~" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" 'TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Play iTunes <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type in and adds a extra space after your dication
Command.content:
' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the control key Const VK_CTRL = &h11
Sub Main HeardWord "switch","to","iTunes" Wait 2 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "+{Tab}" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "{Home}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Space}n" End Sub

Command.name: Close <AppList>
Command.description: Saves the Following document information to the clipboard and closes without saving
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dialer" Then HeardWord "switch to Dialer" If ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Dragonpad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Free Cell" Then HeardWord "switch to FREE CELL" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch to Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Groove" Then HeardWord "switch to GROOVE" If ListVar1 = "Info Path" Then HeardWord "switch to INFO PATH" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Photo House" Then HeardWord "switch to Photo House" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt Editor" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" End Sub

Command.name: Compound <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("compound that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: Build A Command <dictation>
Command.description: Copies highlighted boilerplate text into a new Dragon command
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait .3 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Build Like <dictation>
Command.content:
Sub Main Clipboard ( " Like '%" & ListVar1 & "%'")
SendKeys "^v"
End Sub

Command.name: Calculate <dictation>
Command.description: Thanks to Mike Jerry for this command
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim operator As String Dim firstnum As String Dim secondnum As String Dim result As String
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") Then operator = "Plus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") Then operator = "Minus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") Then operator = "Times" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") Then operator = "Divided By" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") End If
ShellExecute "Calc" Wait 1 'Separate out the numbers firstnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 1) secondnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 1, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 1) 'Strip out any commas from the numbers 'cuz Calculator don't like 'em firstnum = Replace$(firstnum, ",", "") secondnum = Replace$(secondnum, ",", "") SendKeys firstnum Wait 0.1 If operator = "Plus" Then SendKeys "{+}" If operator = "Minus" Then SendKeys "-" If operator = "Divided By" Then SendKeys "/" If operator = "Times" Then SendKeys "{*}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys secondnum Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.2 'Now to format the result to limit decimal places to two digits and add commas every three digits to large numbers result = Clipboard 'If both decimal and integer > 3 If InStr(CStr(result), ".") And Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If decimal only If InStr(CStr(result), ".") Then result = Format( result , "#.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If integer > 3 only If Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0" ) End If Finish:
SendKeys result
End Sub

Command.name: Change All <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 1 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies everything to the clipboard for processing Wait 2 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the document End End Sub

Sub Main HeardWord "open","Settings" Wait 0.7 'SendKeys "Sound Output" 'Wait 0.2 'SendKeys "{Enter}" 'Sound Output Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY","Numbers"
End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main ShellExecute "http://www.speedtest.net/" End Sub

Command.name: Check My Microphone Settings
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgAudioSetupWizard,0,,0) End Sub

Command.name: Check Outlook Mail
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 AppSwapWith "Outlook" Wait 2 HeardWord "Inbox" End Sub

Command.name: Choose Top File
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Tab}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys " " Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Clear Desktop
Command.content: Sub Main ClearDesktop End Sub

Command.name: Clear Line
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Home 2}+{End}{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Click
Command.content: Sub Main ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) End Sub

Command.name: Click <atoz> <atoz>
Command.content:
Public Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Public Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" Alias "mouse_event" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 ' left button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 ' left button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 ' middle button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 ' middle button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 ' right button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10 ' right button up
Private Declare Function GetSystemMetrics Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal nIndex As Long) As Long Const SM_CXSCREEN = 0 Const SM_CYSCREEN = 1 Private Const SM_CMONITORS As Long = 80 Public Type RectAPI Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Private Const SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 76 Private Const SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 77 Private Const SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 78 Private Const SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 79 Dim blnDualMonitors As Boolean Dim blnFineTune As Boolean Sub Main ' this script is primarily for the second screen and assumes resolutions as follows screen one 1680 by 1050 and screen two 1280 by 1024 (1440 times 900 is what the new screen is) ' trying to make this script also work for the following screen set up which is what it is at home 1280×1024 1280×800
Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim myRect As RectAPI Dim x As Long Dim y As Long Dim lngScreen1Width As Long Dim lngScreen1Height As Long Dim lngScreen2Width As Long Dim lngScreen2Height As Long ' work out if there is a second monitor
blnDualMonitors=MultiMonitors() ' get the number of pixels across and down for the main monitor lngScreen1Width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) lngScreen1Height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) 'MsgBox "multi screens" & blnDualMonitors ' get the number of pixels across for the second screen myRect=GetVirtualDisplayRect() lngScreen2Width= myRect.Right -lngScreen1Width ' work out the height of the second screen based on the width of screens If myRect.Right=2960 Or myRect.Right= 2986 Then lngScreen2Height=1024 ElseIf myRect.Right=2560 Then lngScreen2Height=800 ElseIf myRect.Right=3120 Then lngScreen2Height=900 ElseIf myRect.Right= 3360 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 End If 'MsgBox "screen 2 Height " & lngScreen2Height & " myRect.Riight: " & myRect.Right ' now need to put the rest into practice from here blnFineTune=False Dim columnLetter as String columnLetter= CStr(ListVar1) Dim rowLetter as String rowLetter=CStr(ListVar2) intLeft=GetScreenCoordinates(columnLetter,1) intTop=GetScreenCoordinates(rowLetter,2) Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long 'MsgBox " list of variable values are " & ListVar1 & " " & ListVar2 & " " & ListVar3 'MsgBox "fine tune " & blnFineTune If blnFineTune Then SetMousePosition 2,intLeft,intTop Else Dim button as String button="Click" Select Case button Case "Grid Left","Grid" ,"Arrow Click","Click","Right Click","Double Click","doubleclick","Left" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=lngScreen1Width-1 If intTop> lngScreen1Height Then intTop=lngScreen1Height-1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) ' Where X and Y are in pixel Case "Grid Right" ,"Screen Click" ,"Touch","Double Touch","Right Touch","Right" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width + lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=(lngScreen1Width+lngScreen1Width)-1 If intTop> lngScreen2Height Then intTop=lngScreen2Height-1 ' MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Case "Drag","Drag Arrow" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI
SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Screen" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select End If Wait 0.1
Select Case button Case "Arrow Click","Click","Screen Click","Touch"
If ListVar1="Seven" And intTop< 10 Then 'no button click here because it will close the current application and that might not be what you want Else ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) End If
Case "Double Click","Double Touch","doubleclick"
ButtonClick 1,2 Case "Right Click","Right Touch" ButtonClick 2,1 End Select
End Sub Function GetScreenCoordinates(s As String,arg As Integer) As Integer Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer intTop= 100 If arg=1 Then Select Case s Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","For" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven" intLeft= 1650 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intLeft Else Select Case s Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intTop End If End Function
Private Function MultiMonitors() As Boolean MultiMonitors = (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CMONITORS) > 1) End Function
Public Function GetVirtualDisplayRect() As RectAPI With GetVirtualDisplayRect .Left = GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN) .Top = GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN) .Right = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Left .Bottom = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Top End With End Function

Command.name: Clipboard Manager
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^+%c" End Sub

Command.name: Close And Minimize
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^s" Wait 1 SendKeys "%f" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "c" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "n" End Sub

Command.name: Close Task <dictation>
Command.description: Closes and Utility or Application by opening the Task Manager, closing the named app and closing the Task Manager
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^+{Esc}" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Del}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{F4}" End Sub

Command.name: Close the Window
Command.content:
Sub Main if MsgBox ("Do you really wish to close the current application?" _ , vbQuestion + vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2 _ , "Question")=vbYes Then SendKeys "%{F4}" end if
End Sub

Command.name: Close Without Saving <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dialer" Then HeardWord "switch to Dialer" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "switch to DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Free Cell" Then HeardWord "switch to FREE CELL" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Groove" Then HeardWord "switch to GROOVE" If ListVar1 = "Info Path" Then HeardWord "switch to INFO PATH" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Photo House" Then HeardWord "switch to Photo House" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%n" End Sub

Command.name: Code <Direction> <1to20> <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction 1 to 20 times, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" SendKeys ListVar3 End Sub

Command.name: Code <Direction> <dictation>
Command.description: Move in any direction, force dictation and press the spacebar
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Previous" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Next" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Tab" Then SendKeys "{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Shift Tab" Then SendKeys "+{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up}" SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main ' what you can say from the list is: ' any phonetic alphabet letter, alpha to zulu ' any normal letter a to z ' any number 1 to 9 param1 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) SendKeys ""+ param1 + "" End Sub

"Down" If ListVar1="Left" Then param1 = "Left" If ListVar1="Right" Then param1 = "Right" If ListVar1="Page Up Key" Then param1 = "PgUp" If ListVar1="Page Down Key" Then param1 = "PgDn" If ListVar1="Escape Key" Then param1 = "Esc" If ListVar1="Delete Key" Then param1 = "Del" If ListVar1="End Key" Then param1 = "End" If ListVar1="Home Key" Then param1 = "Home" If ListVar1="Enter Key" Then param1 = "Enter" If ListVar1="Tab Key" Then param1 = "Tab" If ListVar1="Shift Tab" Then param1 = "+Tab" If ListVar1="Space Key" Then param1 = "Space" If ListVar1="Spacebar Key" Then param1 = "Space" If ListVar1="Right Arrow" Then param1 = "Right" If ListVar1="Left Arrow" Then param1 = "Left" If ListVar1="Up Arrow" Then param1 = "Up" If ListVar1="Down Arrow" Then param1 = "Down" If ListVar1="Backspace Key" Then param1 = "Backspace" If ListVar1="Page Up" Then param1 = "PgUp" If ListVar1="Page Down" Then param1 = "PgDn" If ListVar1="Escape" Then param1 = "Esc" If ListVar1="Delete" Then param1 = "Del" If ListVar1="End" Then param1 = "End" If ListVar1="Home" Then param1 = "Home" If ListVar1="Enter" Then param1 = "Enter" If ListVar1="Tab" Then param1 = "Tab" If ListVar1="Space" Then param1 = "Space" If ListVar1="Spacebar" Then param1 = "Space" If ListVar1="Backspace" Then param1 = "Backspace" If ListVar1="Plus" Then param1 = "{+}" If ListVar1="Minus" Then param1 = "{-}" If ListVar1="F1" Then param1 = "F1" If ListVar1="F2" Then param1 = "F2" If ListVar1="F3" Then param1 = "F3" If ListVar1="F4" Then param1 = "F4" If ListVar1="F5" Then param1 = "F5" If ListVar1="F6" Then param1 = "F6" If ListVar1="F7" Then param1 = "F7" If ListVar1="F8" Then param1 = "F8" If ListVar1="F9" Then param1 = "F9" If ListVar1="F10" Then param1 = "F10" If ListVar1="F11" Then param1 = "F11" If ListVar1="F12" Then param1 = "F12" SendKeys "{{}"+ param1 + "}" End Sub

Command.name: Command Browser
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main EmulateRecognition "open command browser" End Sub

Command.name: Confirm Show List <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' MsgBox atCNames(0), vbOkOnly, "Computer Name?" ' If UtilityProvider.IsDebugMode Then ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(0,"IntelliSense") ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(1,"Text Blocks") ' End If Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open Dim search as String search=CSTR (ListVar1) search=InputBox("Please Confirm","Confirmation Required",search) GetArrayOfResults search,connection Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Unknown" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub Dim strSendKeysValue As String Dim stringDeliveryType As String Dim CustomIntelliSenseId as Long strSendKeysValue=GetSendKeys_Value(result, stringDeliveryType, Connection,CustomIntelliSenseId) Dim stringClipboardBackup As String stringClipboardBackup= Clipboard
' MsgBox strSendKeysValue If Len(Remarks & "")>0 Then 'SendDragonKeys "'" & Remarks & vbCr & strSendKeysValue ' DragonMsg Remarks ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, Remarks End If ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNone, "Starting Send Keys Process" Select Case stringDeliveryType Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys","Send Dragon Keys","Send System Keys" If InStr(strSendKeysValue,Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue)> 100 Then SendKeys Left (strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeysWithCRLF strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select ProcessAdditionalCommands(CustomIntelliSenseId,Connection) Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetArrayOfResults(searchTerm As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As long Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT CustomIntelliSense.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value) Like '%" & searchTerm & "%')) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Display_Value") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Edit List"
k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetSendKeys_Value(strName As String, stringDeliveryType As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection _ ,CustomIntelliSenseId as long) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As long StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 CustomIntelliSense.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Remarks" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.ID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value)='" & strName & "')) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst ' GetSendKeys_Value = Replace(Recordset![SendKeys_Value], Chr(10), "") GetSendKeys_Value= Recordset![SendKeys_Value] Remarks = Recordset![Remarks] stringDeliveryType= Recordset![DeliveryType] CustomIntelliSenseId= Recordset![ID] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub
Public Sub ProcessAdditionalCommands(CustomIntelliSenseId as long, Connection AS ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim StringSQLText As String StringSQLText = "SELECT AdditionalCommands.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , AdditionalCommands.WaitBefore" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , AdditionalCommands.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM AdditionalCommands " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE AdditionalCommands.CustomIntelliSenseID=" & CustomIntelliSenseId & ";"
Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst Do Until Recordset.EOF If Recordset![WaitBefore] > 0 Then Wait Recordset![WaitBefore] End If Dim strSendKeysValue As String strSendKeysValue = Recordset![Sendkeys_Value] Select Case Recordset![DeliveryType] Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.4 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys", "Send Dragon Keys", "Send System Keys" strSendKeysValue = Replace(strSendKeysValue, "(", "{(}") strSendKeysValue = Replace(strSendKeysValue, ")", "{)}") If InStr(strSendKeysValue, Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue) > 100 Then SendKeys Left(strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select Recordset.MoveNext Loop End If Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing End Sub

Command.name: Convert to KnowBrainer
Command.content:
Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 Dim value as String value=Clipboard value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(0)","ListVar1") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(1)","ListVar2") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(2)","ListVar3") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(3)","ListVar4") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(4)","ListVar5") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue(5)","ListVar6") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (0)","ListVar1") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (1)","ListVar2") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (2)","ListVar3") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (3)","ListVar4") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (4)","ListVar5") value= Replace(value,"UtilityProvider.ContextValue (5)","ListVar6") value= Replace(value,"SendDragonKeys","SendKeys") value= Replace(value,"SendSystemKeys","SendKeys") value= Replace(value,"'#Uses""C:\Users\Mark\Documents\ASGF.txt""","'#Uses""C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt""") value= Replace(value,"'#Uses ""C:\Users\Mark\Documents\ASGF.txt""","'#Uses""C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt""") Wait 0.1
Clipboard(value) SendKeys "^v"
End Sub

Command.name: Copy <Direction> <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" Wait .2 SendKeys "^c{Right}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Down" then SendKeys "+{Down "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Up" then SendKeys "+{Up "+ListVar2+"}" Wait .2 SendKeys "^c{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Copy <Direction> <1to50> Cells

Command.name: Copy <NextOrPrevious> <1to20> Words
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Previous" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Next" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Back" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Forward" then SendKeys "^+{Right "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Last" then SendKeys "^+{Left "+ListVar2+"}" Wait .2 SendKeys "^c{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Copy All To <AppList>
Command.content: SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}{Ctrl+c}" Wait 200 if _arg1 = "Access" Then AppBringUp "MSAccess" if _arg1 = "Excel" Then AppBringUp "Excel" if _arg1 = "Google Chrome" Then AppBringUp "chrome" if _arg1 = "Firefox" Then AppBringUp "firefox" if _arg1 = "Dragon" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" if _arg1 = "Next Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Previous Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Shift+Esc}" if _arg1 = "Other Window" Then SendSystemKeys "{Alt+Tab}" if _arg1 = "Notepad" Then AppBringUp "Notepad" if _arg1 = "One Note" Then AppBringUp "onenote" if _arg1 = "Outlook" Then AppBringUp "Outlook" if _arg1 = "Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "Microsoft Paint" Then AppBringUp "mspaint" if _arg1 = "PowerPoint" Then AppBringUp "PowerPnt" if _arg1 = "Word" Then AppBringUp "WinWord" if _arg1 = "Wordpad" Then AppBringUp "WordPad" if _arg1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 1000 SendKeys "{Ctrl+v}" Wait 100 SendKeys "{Right}"

Command.name: Copy Paste <1to20>
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim integerCounter as Integer For integerCounter = 1 to ListVar1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Tab}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Tab}" SendKeys "{Down}"
Next
End Sub

Command.name: Cut Back

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^h" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^x" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "go","back" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Home}+{End}^x}" End Sub

Command.name: Cut to <move>
Command.description: Moves highlight file or folder to specified Windows address
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^x" If ListVar1 = "KnowBrainer" then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files (x86)\KnowBrainer\KB Professional 14\" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{F4}" End Sub

Command.name: Cut to <Position>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^x" Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Beginning of Document" then SendKeys "^{Home}^v" if ListVar1 = "End of Document" then SendKeys "{Enter 2}^{End}^v" if ListVar1 = "Beginning of Line" then SendKeys "{Home}^v" if ListVar1 = "End of Line" then SendKeys "{End} ^v" if ListVar1 = "Beginning of Paragraph" then SendKeys "^{Up}^v" if ListVar1 = "End of Paragraph" then SendKeys "^{Down} ^v" End Sub

Command.name: Cycle Apps
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Datatype <datatype>
Command.content: Sub Main If InStr(ListVar1,"as " )>0 Then SendKeys " " & ListVar1 & "{Tab}" Else SendKeys "" & ListVar1 & " " End If End Sub

Command.name: Date <1to31> <1to12>
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim day as Integer day=CInt(ListVar1) Dim month as Integer month=CInt(ListVar2) SendKeys Format(day,"0#") & "/" & Format(month,"0#") & "/" & Year(Date())
End Sub

Command.name: Date <1to31> <1to12> <currentyears>
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim day as Integer day=CInt(ListVar1) Dim month as Integer month=CInt(ListVar2) Dim year as Integer year=cInt(ListVar3) if Len(ListVar3)=2 Then year=2000+year end if SendKeys Format(day,"0#") & "/" & Format(month,"0#") & "/" & year
End Sub

Command.name: Date <Year> <MonthList> <1to31>
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim Year as String if ListVar1="21" Then Year="2021" end if SendKeys Year & "-" & MonthNumber(ListVar2) & "-" & Format (ListVar3,"00")
End Sub
Function MonthNumber(myMonthName As String)
MonthNumber = Month(DateValue("1 " & myMonthName & " 2020")) MonthNumber = Format(MonthNumber, "00")
End Function

Command.name: Date Stamp
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys Format (Now, "mm-dd-yyyy") End Sub

If ListVar1="Dee" then param1 = "D." If ListVar1="E." then param1 = "E." If ListVar1="F." then param1 = "F." If ListVar1="gee" then param1 = "G." If ListVar1="H." then param1 = "H." If ListVar1="I" then param1 = "I." If ListVar1="Jay" then param1 = "J." If ListVar1="Kay" then param1 = "K." If ListVar1="L." then param1 = "L." If ListVar1="M." then param1 = "M." If ListVar1="N." then param1 = "N." If ListVar1="oh" then param1 = "O." If ListVar1="pee" then param1 = "P." If ListVar1="cue" then param1 = "Q." If ListVar1="are" then param1 = "R." If ListVar1="S." then param1 = "S." If ListVar1="tea" then param1 = "T." If ListVar1="you" then param1 = "U." If ListVar1="V." then param1 = "V." If ListVar1="W." then param1 = "W." If ListVar1="X." then param1 = "X." If ListVar1="why" then param1 = "Y." If ListVar1="Z." then param1 = "Z." SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter 2}" + param1 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Enter Date <dayexpressions>
Command.content: Sub Main Dim stringFormat As String Dim stringDate As String stringFormat="dd/mm/yyyy" Select Case ListVar1 Case "Today" stringDate= Format (Date(), stringFormat) Case "Tomorrow" stringDate= Format (Date()+1,stringFormat) Case "Yesterday" stringDate= Format (Date()-1,stringFormat) Case "Day after Tomorrow" stringDate= Format (Date()+2,stringFormat) Case "Day before Yesterday" stringDate= Format (Date()-2,stringFormat) Case "Next Week" stringDate= Format (Date()+7,stringFormat) Case "Last Week" stringDate= Format (Date()-7,stringFormat) Case "Last Saturday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Sat" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Sunday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Sun" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Monday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Mon" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Tuesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Tue" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Wednesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Wed" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Thursday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Thu" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Last Friday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()-k,"ddd")="Fri" Then stringDate= Format (Date()-k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Sunday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Sun" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Saturday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Sat" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Monday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Mon" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Tuesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Tue" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Wednesday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Wed" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Thursday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Thu" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next Case "Next Friday" For k =1 To 7 If Format(Date()+k,"ddd")="Fri" Then stringDate= Format (Date()+k,stringFormat) End If Next End Select SendKeys stringDate End Sub

Command.name: Enter Multiple Items
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim strResult As String Dim k As Integer Dim strInsert As String Dim sString(2) As String sString(0)="Down"
sString(1)="Up" sString(2)="Tab" Dim Action(2) As String Action(0)="Enter"
Action(1)="Up" Action(2)="TAB" Begin Dialog UserDialog 400,252," Enter Repeating Value ",.DialogFunc ' %GRID:10,7,1,1 ' left, top, weight, height Text 20,14,220,14," What value do you wish to enter:",.Text1 TextBox 20,35,370,21,.TextBox1 Text 20,70,220,14," How Many Times:",.Text2 TextBox 20,90,370,21,.TextBox2 Text 30,119,220,14,"Direction:",.Text3 ListBox 20,140,370,56,sString(),.listva1,2 CheckBox 20,203,100,14,"Increment",.CheckBoxIncrement OKButton 70,224,90,21 CancelButton 220,224,90,21 End Dialog Dim dlg As UserDialog dlg.listva1=0
result = Dialog (dlg)
If result = -1 Then ' If the user clicked OK, ' MsgBox "Your name is " + dlg.TextBox1
Dim longValue As Long Dim DateValue As Date Dim stringDataType As String If IsDate(dlg.TextBox1) Then stringDataType="Date" DateValue=CDate (dlg.TextBox1) ElseIf IsNumeric(dlg.TextBox1) Then stringDataType="Numeric" longValue=CLng(dlg.TextBox1) Else stringDataType="Text" End If
' MsgBox sString(dlg.lista1) Dim l As Integer For l = 1 To Val (dlg.TextBox2) If dlg.CheckboxIncrement Then Select Case stringDataType Case "Date" If l>1 Then DateValue= DateValue +1 SendKeys DateValue & "{" & Action(dlg.listva1) & "}" Case "Numeric" If l>1 Then longValue= longValue+1 SendKeys longValue & "{" & Action(dlg.listva1) & "}" End Select Else SendKeys(dlg.TextBox1 & "{" & Action(dlg.listva1) & "}") End If Next End If End Sub
Function DialogFunc%(DlgItem$, Action%, SuppValue%)
Select Case Action% Case 5 DlgFocus("TextBox1") End Select
End Function

Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim LRandomNumber As Integer Randomize Dim Word As String Dim integerCounter As Integer For integerCounter = 1 To 10 LRandomNumber = Int((97 - 122 + 1) * Rnd + 122) Word = Word & Chr(LRandomNumber) Next Word = Word & "@gmail.com" SendKeys Word,True
End Sub

Sub Main
Dim LRandomNumber As Integer Randomize Dim Word As String WORD ="0" Dim integerCounter As Integer For integerCounter = 1 To 10 LRandomNumber = Int((9* Rnd) +1) Word = Word & LRandomNumber Next
SendKeys Word,True
End Sub

Command.name: Find Mouse Position
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y clip = clip & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "Wait .5" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "ButtonClick 1,1" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) ' Clipboard clip ' 'TTSPlayString "mouse position is ready to be pasted" End Sub

Command.name: Get Ticket Name
Command.content:
Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
Sub Main
Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long
GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates
xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) SetMousePosition 0,-928,269 Beep Wait 1.1 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.1 SetMousePosition 1,-1028,269
SendKeys "^c" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.1 AppBringUp "C:\Program Files (x86)\Upwork\upwork.exe" Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY","Numbers"
End Sub

Command.name: Go Ticket
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main on error GOTO HandleError SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.5
Dim CopiedItem as string on error GOTO Ignore CopiedItem= trim (Clipboard) Ignore: on error GOTO HandleError Wait 0.5 Dim Website as String Website="https://support.netrefer.com/browse/" & CopiedItem if LEN(CopiedItem)=5 Then Website="https://support.netrefer.com/browse/NRS-" & CopiedItem ElseIf LEN(CopiedItem)=0 Then Exit Sub end if
ShellExecute Website
' AppBringUp strCommandLine ExitHere: Exit Sub
HandleError: Select Case Err.number ' Case 9 'Do Something 'Resume ExitHere Case Else BEEP MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure " _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere End Select End Sub

Command.name: Go To Mouse Position
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Option Explicit Private Type cursorinformation x As Integer y As Integer End Type Dim cursorinformation As cursorinformation Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Function SetMousePositionW(integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos CLng(integerLeft), CLng(integerTop)
End Function
Sub Main()
Dim stringSQLText As String
GetSavedMousePosition ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "X: " & cursorinformation.x & " Y: " & cursorinformation.y
SetMousePositionW cursorinformation.x, cursorinformation.y
End Sub Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Function GetSavedMousePosition() Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT [SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].X" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].Y" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM [SavedMousePosition]" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE ((([SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation)='Default'));" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst cursorinformation.x = Recordset![x] cursorinformation.y = Recordset![y] End If Recordset.Close
End Function

Command.name: Go To Mouse Position <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" ' Option Explicit Private Type cursorinformation x As Integer y As Integer End Type Dim cursorinformation As cursorinformation Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long
Sub Main()
Dim stringSQLText As String
Dim namedLocation as String namedLocation=ListVar1 GetSavedMousePosition namedLocation SetMousePositionW cursorinformation.x, cursorinformation.y
End Sub
Function SetMousePositionW(integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos CLng(integerLeft), CLng(integerTop)
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Function GetSavedMousePosition(namedLocation as String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer stringSQLText = "SELECT [SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].X" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].Y" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM [SavedMousePosition]" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE ((([SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation)='" & namedLocation & "'))" stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY [SavedMousePosition].Created Desc" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst cursorinformation.x = Recordset![x] cursorinformation.y = Recordset![y] End If Recordset.Close
End Function

Command.name: Google Translate That
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim stringApplication As String Dim stringCommandLine As String SendKeys "^c" Dim stringValue As String On Error Resume Next stringValue= Clipboard If Err.Number<>0 Then Exit Sub If Len(stringValue)= 0 Then Exit Sub stringValue= Trim (stringValue) stringValue=Replace(stringValue," ","%20") stringApplication="""C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe""" stringCommandLine="https://translate.google.co.uk/#en/fr/" & stringValue Shell stringApplication & " " & stringCommandLine, 3
End Sub

Command.name: Grab <Direction> <1to12> <move-by-unit>
Command.description: provided by Alan Cantor
Command.content:
Sub Main ' Select text in non-Dragon friendly applications. Examples: ' "Grab Right 2 Words" ' "Grab Down 5 Lines" ' "Grab Up 8 Paragraphs" ' "Grab Left 12 Characters" ' OK to substitute "Cares" for "Characters" and "Paras" for "Paragraphs"
Dim Direction, Count, Unit As String
Let Direction = ListVar1 ' down, left, right, or up Let Count = ListVar2 ' Number of repetitions Let Unit = Left(ListVar3, InStr(ListVar3, "\")-1) ' SendKey codes to select words, lines, characters, paragraphs, etc.
SendKeys Unit & "{" & Direction & " " & Count & "}" ' Example: SendKeys "+^{Right 5}" End Sub

Sub Main Dim words() As String Dim dictation As String dictation=ListVar1 words=Split(dictation," ") Dim k As Integer Dim result As String For k = 0 To UBound(words) result=result & UCase(Left(words(k),1)) & Mid(words(k),2) Next SendKeys "#" & result
End Sub

Command.name: KnowBrainer Login
Command.content:
'#Reference {EAB22AC0-30C1-11CF-A7EB-0000C05BAE0B}#1.1#0#C:\Windows\SysWOW64\ieframe.dll#Microsoft Internet Controls#SHDocVw '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\PROGRA~2\Nuance\NATURA~1\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" 'Script Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2015 www.pcbyvoice.com Const READYSTATE_COMPLETE = 4 ' Declare Internet Explorer object Dim IE As SHDocVw.InternetExplorer Sub Main MsgBox "The first time you run this command you will see this message box. After the command completes you will likely get a message that your login credentials are invalid. Please open the command and change the username and password on lines 27 and 28. Then remove line 6 which is this message." ' create instance of InternetExplorer Set IE = New InternetExplorer ' using your newly created instance of Internet Explorer With IE .Visible = True .Navigate2 "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/index.cfm" ' Wait until page we are navigating to is loaded Do While .Busy Loop Do Loop Until .ReadyState = READYSTATE_COMPLETE ' the username and password values will not exist if already logged in ' so no need to fill in the values and go straight to Next On Error Resume Next If Err Then 'Do Nothing Else ' When the page is fully loaded enter your username and password ' you will need to set these appropriately With .Document.forms("login" ) .FTVAR_USERNAMEFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR USER NAME HERE" .FTVAR_PASSWORDFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR PASSWORD HERE" .submit End With ' Wait until fully logged in Do While .Busy Loop End If
'.Navigate2 "https://caaware.dor.ca.gov/aware5/VR/Landing.aspx#=y"
End With ' Tidy Up Set IE = Nothing End Sub

Command.name: Launcher <launcher_categories>
Command.content:
'#Reference {57D58F7A-9EB7-40AC-98FC-8E14FA414452}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dgnmycmds.dll#DgnMyCommands#DgnMyCommands '#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim appList(100) As String Sub Main Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String Dim intMenuNumber As Integer Dim strCategory As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler
strCategory=ListVar1 If strCategory="Categories" Then result="Back to Categories" End If Dim longCounter As Long Do longCounter=longCounter + 1 If result="Back to Categories" Then GetArrayOfCategory Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl strCategory = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your category " & longCounter, 1400, 700) End If GetlApplicationNameArray(strCategory) result = EngineControl.PromptValue(appList(), "choose " & strCategory & " " & longCounter, 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then 'strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" ' strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Launcher" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) ' Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) strCategory=Replace(strCategory," ","%20") strCommandline="http://localhost:5000/launchers?category=" & strCategory ShellExecute strCommandLine
Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub End If
' If Not result="Back to Categories" Then Exit Do Dim integerCounter As Integer If Not result="Back to Categories" Then For integerCounter = 0 To UBound(appList) -1 If result=appList(integerCounter) Then ' 'TTSPlayString result Exit Do End If Next End If If longCounter> 5 Then result="" Exit Do End If Loop
If result="" Then Exit Sub strCommandLine=GetCommandLine(result) Dim stringFolder as String stringFolder="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\" strCommandLine= Replace(strCommandLine,Chr(34),"") Select Case Right(strCommandLine,3) Case "mdb", "mda", "mdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "cdb","cda","cdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "rtf", "doc", "dot" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\winword.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine) Case Else If strCommandLine="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\ONENOTE.EXE" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus ElseIf strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\Cognitive-Speech-STT-Windows\samples\SpeechRecognitionServiceExample\bin\x64\Debug\SpeechToText-WPF-Sample.exe" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbNormalNoFocus ElseIf InStr(strCommandLine,"http")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"www")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"//")>0 Then ShellExecute strCommandLine Else IF FileExists(strCommandline)Then AppBringUp strCommandLine ELSEIf FolderExists(strCommandline) Then AppBringUp strCommandLine else MsgBox "Commandline does not exist " & strCommandline,0,"Check the settings" End If End If
End Select
'EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "Opening: " & strCommandLine
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: Shell "C:\Users\MPhil\Source\Repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\ExecuteCommands\bin\Release\ExecuteCommands.exe" _ & " " & chr(34) & Err.Number & " Error Message: " & Err.Description & " Result:" & result & " Commandline:" & strCommandline & chr(34) ,vbNormalFocus
Resume ExitHere
End Sub
Function GetlApplicationNameArray(strCategory As String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String stringSQLText = "SELECT Launcher.Name" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM (Categories " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " INNER JOIN Launcher " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = Launcher.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " LEFT JOIN Computers " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ON Launcher.ComputerID = Computers.ID" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName)='" & atCNames(0) & "')) " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " OR (((Categories.Category)='" & strCategory & "') " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " AND ((Computers.ComputerName) Is Null))" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;"
Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Dim k As Integer
Erase appList() Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 appList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Name") If Mid(appList(k),2,1)="." Then appList(k)= Trim(Mid(appList(k),3)) End If
'rs![Menu] = 0
Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close k=k +1 appList(k)="Edit List" k=k+1 appList(k)="Back to Categories" k=k+1 appList(k)="Quit Menu"
End Function
Function GetArrayOfCategory() Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String
strSQLText = "SELECT Categories.ID" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Categories where Categories.Category_type='Launch Applications';" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Category") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" End Function
Function GetCategoryfromNumber(intMenuNumber As Integer)As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
Dim strSQLText As String Dim k As Integer
strSQLText = "SELECT TOP 1 Categories.Category" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Categories" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Categories.ID) = " & intMenuNumber & "));" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetCategoryfromNumber= (Recordset![Category]) Else 'MsgBox " cannot find Category for " & intMenuNumber Shell "C:\Users\MPhil\Source\Repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\ExecuteCommands\bin\Release\ExecuteCommands.exe" _ & " " & chr(34) & " Error Message: " & "Cannot find CATEGORY for " & intMemberNumber & chr(34) ,vbNormalFocus
End If
Recordset.Close
End Function
Function GetCommandLine(strName As String) As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
Dim strSQLText As String Dim k As Integer strSQLText = "SELECT TOP 1 Launcher.CommandLine" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Launcher" & vbCrLf ' strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name) Like '*" & strName & "'));" strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name) = '" & strName & "'));" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetCommandLine= Recordset![CommandLine] Else 'MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName Shell "C:\Users\MPhil\Source\Repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\ExecuteCommands\bin\Release\ExecuteCommands.exe" _ & " " & chr(34) & " Error Message: " & "Cannot find command line for " & strName & chr(34) ,vbNormalFocus
End If
Recordset.Close
End Function Function FileExists(FileName As String) On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "") End Function
Public Function FolderExists(sFullPath As String) As Boolean Dim myFSO As Object Set myFSO = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject") FolderExists = myFSO.FolderExists(sFullPath) End Function

Command.name: Mouse Location
Command.description: Copies the Current Mouse Position To the Clipboard
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function
Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y ' Clipboard clip ' End Sub

Sub Main

' <>-<> 2nd keystroke pos = InStr (_arg2,"\") key$ = Mid$ (_arg2, 0, pos-1) SendKeys key$

End Sub

Command.name: Multiple Launcher
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" 'Good <time> Dragon Option Explicit Dim ml_List(100) As String Sub Main Dim result As String Dim strGreeting As String
GetArrayOfMultipleLauncher ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 2",0 ' CommandModeOn Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(ml_List(), "what do you want to do today", 1400, 700) ' ExecuteScript "SetRecognitionMode 0",0 ' NormalModeOn If result="Quit Menu" Then End ' 'TTSPlayString "Okay" LaunchMultipleApplications(result) End
End Sub Function GetArrayOfMultipleLauncher() Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT MultipleLauncher.id" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " , MultipleLauncher.Description" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM MultipleLauncher;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 ml_List(k)= Recordset.Fields("Description") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close k= k +1 ml_List(k)="Quit Menu" End Function Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function Function LaunchMultipleApplications(strDescription As String) Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer Dim result As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler StringSQLText = "SELECT Launcher.CommandLine" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Launcher.Name" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM (LauncherMultipleLauncherBridge " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN MultipleLauncher " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON LauncherMultipleLauncherBridge.MultipleLauncherID = MultipleLauncher.ID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN Launcher " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON LauncherMultipleLauncherBridge.LauncherID = Launcher.ID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((MultipleLauncher.Description)='" & strDescription & "'))" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;"
Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Dim strCommandLine As String Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 'AppBringUp rs.Fields("Name"),rs.Fields("CommandLine") strCommandLine= Recordset.Fields("CommandLine") strCommandLine= Replace(strCommandLine,Chr(34),"") result= Recordset.Fields("Name") Select Case Right(strCommandLine,3) Case "mdb", "mda", "mdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\OFFICE14\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "cdb","cda" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\OFFICE14\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "rtf", "doc", "dot" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\OFFICE14\winword.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine) Case "exe","EXE" Shell Recordset.Fields("CommandLine"),vbNormalFocus Case Else If InStr(strCommandLine,"dotnet")>0 Then Shell strCommandLine,vbMinimizedNoFocus ElseIf InStr(strCommandLine,"http") = 0 Then ShellExecute strCommandLine,vbMinimizedNoFocus Else ShellExecute strCommandLine,vbMinimizedNoFocus ' AppBringUp result,strCommandLine End If
End Select
'Display an instruction in DragonBar ' MsgBox result, vbInformation, strCommandLine ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, "Opening: " & Recordset.Fields("CommandLine") Dim dummy As String ' dummy=InputBox("this is a pause " & Recordset!Commandline) Wait 1 Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End ErrorHandler:
Select Case Err.Number ' Case 1
Case Else MsgBox "The following un handled error has occurred:" & vbCr & Recordset.Fields("CommandLine") & vbCr & Err.Description, vbCritical+vbOkOnly+vbDefaultButton1 _ , "An Error Has Occurred" End Select End Function

Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below
'EmulateRecognition "New Application Command" HeardWord "Add","Application","Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: New Mouse Dragon Command <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools
Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgNewCommandWizard, 0, , 0) Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 HeardWord "\cap","that" Wait 2 SendKeys "%y" 'Command Type Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%r" ' get to script window Wait 0.2
CreateSetMousePositionCode End Sub
' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub CreateSetMousePositionCode
Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 0," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%a" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%p" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Down}" End Sub
