Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main

Command.name: Paste <0to9>
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String Dim intClipboardNumber As Integer Dim strCategory As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler If ListVar1="1" Then intClipboardNumber=1 Else value=Val(ListVar1) intClipboardNumber= value End If If intClipboardNumber<10 Then SendKeys "+%^" & ListVar1 & "" End If
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: ' Clipboard strClipboardValue ' SendKeys strClipboardValue MsgBox Err.Description,," An Error Has Occurred " & Err.Number Resume ExitHere
End Sub

Sub Main Dim value as String value=Clipboard value=Replace(value,CHR(10),"") value=Replace(value,CHR(13),"") value=TRIM(value) SendKeys value
End Sub

End If SendKeys "^w" Wait .3 EmulateRecognition "Call Number" End Sub

Command.name: Please Change <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Change <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String if instr(ListVar1," to ") = 0 Then Exit Sub end if
'On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = LCase (Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2)) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = lCase (Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5)) SendKeys "^+{Up}" 'Selects previous paragraph Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing
Wait 0.1 testPhrase = lCASE (Clipboard$()) 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase,phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable
Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the current paragraph 'MSGBOX "Index:" & index & " phrase to replace: " & phraseToReplace & " New Phrase " & newPhrase & " New String " & newString & " Test Phrase " & testPhrase 'newString=Replace(testPhrase,phraseToReplace,newPhrase) End Sub

'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Sub Main Dim counter As Integer Dim startPosition As Integer startPosition= 1000 For counter=startPosition To 1620 Step 20 SetMousePositionW 0, counter , 1030 Wait 0.1 Next End Sub Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer)
SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: Restore <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch to ACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Act" Then HeardWord "switch to ACT" If ListVar1 = "AOL" Then HeardWord "switch to AOL" If ListVar1 = "Dragonpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Dragonpad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch to Excel" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch to Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch to FRONT Page" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch to Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Microsoft Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "switch to Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch to One Note" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch to Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch to Power Point" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch to Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Snag It" Then HeardWord "switch to SnagIt Editor" If ListVar1 = "Sound Recorder" Then HeardWord "switch to sound recorder" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch to Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch to Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch to WordPerfect" If ListVar1 = "Write" Then HeardWord "switch to Write" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "r" End Sub

Command.name: Running Processes
Command.content:
'#Reference #System.Windows.Forms, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET"
Imports System.Diagnostics 'Access the Process namespace Sub Main Dim sProcesses() As Process Dim sProcess As Process Dim s, p As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler Dim search as String search=InputBox("Enter a search value","Search for a Process","dgn")
' Get all running system processes sProcesses = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses() s = "" s = vbCrLf & "Procss Names currently running: " & vbCrLf & vbCRLf For Each sProcess In sProcesses ' compose a string with all the process names separated commas If sProcess.ProcessName.Contains(search) Then s = s + sProcess.ProcessName() & ", " End If Next ' Display all the processes currently running in a MessageBox MsgBox s ErrorHandler:: ' deal with error here if required End Sub

Command.name: Save Mouse Position
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type Private Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Sub Main() Dim cursorInformation As POINTAPI ' Get the current mouse cursor coordinates: Call GetCursorPos(cursorInformation) ' Print out current position on the form: ' Print "Current X = " & rect.x ' Print "Current Y = " & rect.y Dim stringSQLText As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open
stringSQLText = "UPDATE [SavedMousePosition] SET [SavedMousePosition].NamedLocation = 'Default'" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].X = " & cursorInformation.x & "" & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " , [SavedMousePosition].Y = " & cursorInformation.y & ";" Connection.Execute stringSQLText Dim stringTemporary As String stringTemporary="longTop=" & cursorInformation.y & " : longLeft=" & cursorInformation.x Clipboard(stringTemporary)
End Sub Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

Command.name: Show Launcher <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open GetArrayOfResults ListVar1,connection Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Launcher" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub ' MsgBox result, vbExclamation, "Result" strCommandLine=GetLauncher_Value(result, Connection) 'MsgBox strCommandLine, vbExclamation, "Testing" Dim stringFolder as String stringFolder="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\" strCommandLine= Replace(strCommandLine,Chr(34),"") Select Case Right(strCommandLine,3) Case "mdb", "mda", "mdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "cdb","cda","cdw" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\MSACCESS.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus) Case "rtf", "doc", "dot" strCommandLine = """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\winword.EXE"" " _ & Chr(34) & strCommandLine & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine) Case Else If strCommandLine="C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\ONENOTE.EXE" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbMaximizedFocus ElseIf strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\Cognitive-Speech-STT-Windows\samples\SpeechRecognitionServiceExample\bin\x64\Debug\SpeechToText-WPF-Sample.exe" Then Shell strCommandLine,vbNormalNoFocus ElseIf InStr(strCommandLine,"http")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"www")>0 Or InStr(strCommandLine,"//")>0 Then ShellExecute strCommandLine Else AppBringUp strCommandLine End If
End Select
Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"An Error Has Occurred " & result Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetArrayOfResults(searchTerm As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As Integer Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT Launcher.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM Launcher " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name) Like '%" & searchTerm & "%')) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Name") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Edit List"
k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetLauncher_Value(strName As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As Integer StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 Launcher.CommandLine" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Launcher " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((Launcher.Name)='" & strName & "')) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY Launcher.Name;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetLauncher_Value= Recordset![CommandLine] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub

Command.name: Show List <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Dim catList(100) As String Dim IntelliSenseList(100) As String Dim Remarks As Variant Sub Main Dim strLanguage As String Dim strApp As String Dim listnames() As String Dim result As String Dim strCommandLine As String On Error GoTo ErrorHandler ' MsgBox atCNames(0), vbOkOnly, "Computer Name?" ' If UtilityProvider.IsDebugMode Then ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(0,"IntelliSense") ' UtilityProvider.SetContextValue(1,"Text Blocks") ' End If Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString = GetConnectionString()' "Provider=SQLOLEDB;Data Source=USER-HP;Initial Catalog=MyDatabase;Integrated Security=SSPI;" Connection.Open GetArrayOfResults ListVar1,connection Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl result = EngineControl.PromptValue(catList(), "choose your item", 1400, 700) If result="Edit List" Then strCommandLine="C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\VoiceLauncher\bin\Release\VoiceLauncher.exe" strCommandLine = strCommandLine & " " & Chr(34) & "/ " & "Unknown" & CHR(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & "Unknown" & Chr(34) & " " & Chr(34) & " / " & ListVar1 & Chr(34) Shell(strCommandLine,vbNormalFocus) Exit Sub End If
If result="Quit Menu" Then Exit Sub Dim strSendKeysValue As String Dim stringDeliveryType As String Dim CustomIntelliSenseId as Long strSendKeysValue=GetSendKeys_Value(result, stringDeliveryType, Connection,CustomIntelliSenseId) Dim stringClipboardBackup As String stringClipboardBackup= Clipboard
' MsgBox strSendKeysValue If Len(Remarks & "")>0 Then 'SendDragonKeys "'" & Remarks & vbCr & strSendKeysValue ' DragonMsg Remarks ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage 0, Remarks End If ' EngineControl.DragonBar.ShowMessage showmessageNone, "Starting Send Keys Process" Select Case stringDeliveryType Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys","Send Dragon Keys","Send System Keys" If InStr(strSendKeysValue,Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue)> 100 Then SendKeys Left (strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeysWithCRLF strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select ProcessAdditionalCommands(CustomIntelliSenseId,Connection) Connection.Close Set Connection= Nothing
ExitHere: Exit Sub
ErrorHandler: If Err.Number= 521 Or Err.Number= 10140 Then ' I believe this is can't access the clipboard Resume Next End If MsgBox Err.Number & " " & Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " Resume ExitHere End Sub
Function GetArrayOfResults(searchTerm As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String On Error GoTo GetArrayOfCategory_Error Dim k As long Dim strSQLText As String strSQLText = "SELECT CustomIntelliSense.*" & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " FROM CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " WHERE (((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value) Like '%" & searchTerm & "%')) " & vbCrLf strSQLText = strSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open strSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst End If
Do Until Recordset.EOF k=k+1 catList(k)= Recordset.Fields("Display_Value") Recordset.MoveNext Loop Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing k= k +1 catList(k)="Edit List"
k= k +1 catList(k)="Quit Menu" ExitHere: Exit Function
GetArrayOfCategory_Error: Select Case Err.Number '1 Case Else MsgBox "Unexpected Error:" _ & vbCrLf & "Error " & Err.Number & " " & Err.Description _ & " in procedure GetArrayOfCategory of VBA Document Form_test some code" _ , vbCritical, "Please Investigate" Resume ExitHere ' Resume 'For Debug Only End Select
End Function
Function GetSendKeys_Value(strName As String, stringDeliveryType As String, Connection As ADODB.Connection _ ,CustomIntelliSenseId as long) As String Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Dim StringSQLText As String Dim k As long StringSQLText = "SELECT Top 1 CustomIntelliSense.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Remarks" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.ID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Languages.Language" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , CustomIntelliSense.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , Categories.Category" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM Languages " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN (Categories " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " INNER JOIN CustomIntelliSense " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Categories.ID = CustomIntelliSense.CategoryID) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ON Languages.ID = CustomIntelliSense.LanguageID" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE (((CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value)='" & strName & "')) " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " ORDER BY CustomIntelliSense.Display_Value;" Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst ' GetSendKeys_Value = Replace(Recordset![SendKeys_Value], Chr(10), "") GetSendKeys_Value= Recordset![SendKeys_Value] Remarks = Recordset![Remarks] stringDeliveryType= Recordset![DeliveryType] CustomIntelliSenseId= Recordset![ID] Else MsgBox " cannot find command line for " & strName End If
Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing
End Function
Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function
Public Sub SendKeysWithCRLF(stringValue As String) Dim stringTemporary As String Dim integerPosition As Integer 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) & Chr(10)) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13)) 'integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(10)) If integerPosition > 0 Then stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Do
'Debug.Print stringTemporary SendKeys stringTemporary, True SendKeys "{Enter}"
stringValue = Mid(stringValue, integerPosition + 2) integerPosition = InStr(stringValue, Chr(13) ) If integerPosition = 0 Then Exit Do stringTemporary = Left(stringValue, integerPosition - 1) Loop End If SendKeys stringValue 'Debug.Print stringValue End Sub
Public Sub ProcessAdditionalCommands(CustomIntelliSenseId as long, Connection AS ADODB.Connection) Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim StringSQLText As String StringSQLText = "SELECT AdditionalCommands.SendKeys_Value" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , AdditionalCommands.WaitBefore" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " , AdditionalCommands.DeliveryType" & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " FROM AdditionalCommands " & vbCrLf StringSQLText = StringSQLText & " WHERE AdditionalCommands.CustomIntelliSenseID=" & CustomIntelliSenseId & ";"
Recordset.Open StringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst Do Until Recordset.EOF If Recordset![WaitBefore] > 0 Then Wait Recordset![WaitBefore] End If Dim strSendKeysValue As String strSendKeysValue = Recordset![Sendkeys_Value] Select Case Recordset![DeliveryType] Case "Copy and Paste" Clipboard strSendKeysValue Wait 0.4 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 Clipboard stringClipboardBackup Case "Send Keys", "Send Dragon Keys", "Send System Keys" strSendKeysValue = Replace(strSendKeysValue, "(", "{(}") strSendKeysValue = Replace(strSendKeysValue, ")", "{)}") If InStr(strSendKeysValue, Chr(13)) = 0 Then If Len(strSendKeysValue) > 100 Then SendKeys Left(strSendKeysValue, 100), True Wait 0.1 SendKeys Mid(strSendKeysValue, 101), True Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue, True End If Else SendKeys strSendKeysValue End If Case "Execute as Script" 'VoiceCommand.ExecuteScript strSendKeysValue,0 Case "Clipboard Only" Clipboard strSendKeysValue End Select Recordset.MoveNext Loop End If Recordset.Close Set Recordset= Nothing End Sub

Command.name: System Information
Command.content: '#Reference #Microsoft.VisualBasic, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Reference #System.Management, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" 'Example script by RWilke Imports System.Management Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices Function GetCPUInfo() As String Dim strCPUInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim query As New SelectQuery( "Win32_Processor" ) Dim search As New ManagementObjectSearcher( query ) Dim info As ManagementObject For Each info In search.Get() strCPUInfo += "CPU:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "Name" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cores / Threads:" + vbTab + info( "NumberOfCores" ) + " / " + info( "NumberOfLogicalProcessors" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cache:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "L2CacheSize" ) + " KB L2 / " + info( "L3CacheSize" ) + " KB L3" + vbCrLf Next Return strCPUInfo End Function Function GetComputerInfo() As String Dim computerInfo As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Computer Dim strComputerInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim lTotalMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) Dim lAvailableMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) strComputerInfo += "Physical Memory:" + vbTab + lTotalMem.ToString() + " GB Total" _ + " / " + lAvailableMem.ToString() + " GB Available" + " / " _ + (Round(100-(100/lTotalMem*lAvailableMem))).ToString()+ " % Used" + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "Operating System:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSFullName + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Platform:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSPlatform + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Version:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSVersion + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Language:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.InstalledUICulture.ToString() + vbCrLf Return strComputerInfo End Function Sub Main Dim s As String = String.Empty() s += GetCPUInfo() s += GetComputerInfo() s += vbCrLf + vbCrLf + "Click Yes to save to a file, click No to quit" + vbCrLf If MsgBox( s, vbYesNo ) = vbYes Then Dim saveFileDialog As New Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog() saveFileDialog.Filter = "txt files (*.txt)|*.txt" saveFileDialog.ShowDialog() End If End Sub

Command.name: Tray Icon Only
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "tray","icon","mode" End Sub

Command.name: Triple Click
Command.content: Sub Main ButtonClick 1,1 ButtonClick 1,1 ButtonClick 1,1 End Sub

Command.name: Triple List <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}{Enter 3}"+ListVar1+". " HeardWord "\Cap" End Sub

Command.name: Underline
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^u" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Underline Off
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^u" End Sub

Command.name: Underline On
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^u" End Sub

Command.name: Undo
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^z" End Sub

Command.name: Undo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^z" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Undo That
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^z" End Sub

Command.name: Uppercase <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("\all-caps that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: Use In Code
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "USE " End Sub

Command.name: Use Windows Speech
Command.content: Sub Main GoToSleep Shell "C:\Users\MPhil\Source\Repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\ExecuteCommands\bin\Release\ExecuteCommands.exe" _ & " \startstoplistening" ,vbHide End Sub

Command.name: View Bookmark 3
Command.content: SendSystemKeys "l"

Command.name: View Last Capture
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^%l" End Sub

Command.name: Vocabulary Editor
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgVocabularyEditor,0,,0) Wait 1 SendKeys "%i" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%r" End Sub

Command.name: Voice Typing
Command.content:
Sub Main GoToSleep SendKeys "{WindowsHold}h"
End Sub

Command.name: Volume Down <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Down "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 'TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Level <1to100>
Command.description: Change your volume output level from 1 to 100 (maximum)
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Up <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 'TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Web Search That
Command.description: Say "Google KnowBrainer" to open a new tab, in your browser and seach the KnowBrainer site
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 ShellExecute "https://www.google.com/" Wait 1.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait .5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: What Day Is It
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 ShellExecute "Wordpad" Wait 1 HeardWord "Todays","Date" Wait 2 SendKeys "+{Home}" Wait 2 HeardWord "set","size","72" Wait 2 HeardWord "read","that" Wait 3 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: What Did I Say
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "show","recognition","history" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Up}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%u" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 EmulateRecognition "Read That" Wait 2 SendKeys "%c" End Sub

Command.name: What is My IP Address
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 OpenWebsite "http://dynupdate.no-ip.com/ip.php" End Sub

Command.name: Wheel <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content: Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Up" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Down" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Right" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Left" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) End Select End Sub

Command.name: Where in Code
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys " WHERE " End Sub

Command.name: WINDOW <window Position>
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.01 If ListVar1 = "left half" Then PositionWindow 1, 1 If ListVar1 = "two left half" Then PositionWindow 2, 1 If ListVar1 = "right half" Then PositionWindow 1, 2 If ListVar1 = "two right half" Then PositionWindow 2, 2 If ListVar1 = "top half" Then PositionWindow 1,3 If ListVar1 = "bottom half" Then PositionWindow 1, 4 If ListVar1 = "middle" Then PositionWindow 1, 5 If ListVar1 = "top left" Then PositionWindow 1, 6 If ListVar1 = "top right" Then PositionWindow 1, 7 If ListVar1 = "bottom left" Then PositionWindow 1, 8 If ListVar1 = "bottom right" Then PositionWindow 1, 9 If ListVar1 = "maximise" Then PositionWindow 1, 10 if ListVar1="monitor one" Then PositionWindow 1,10 'if ListVar1="monitor two" Then PositionWindow 3, 10 if ListVar1="left" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Left}" if ListVar1="right" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Right}" if ListVar1="top" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Up}" if ListVar1="bottom" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Down}" End Sub

Command.name: Window Monitor Switch
Command.content: SendSystemKeys "{Win+Shift+Right}"

Command.name: Window Monitor Switch Left
Command.content: SendSystemKeys "{Win+Shift+Left}"

Command.name: Window Right
Command.content: SendSystemKeys "{Win+Right}"

Command.name: Windows Clipboard
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}v" End Sub

Command.name: Yes Close Dragon
Command.content:
Sub Main SetMousePosition 0,800,500 ButtonClick 1,1 SendKeys "y"
End Sub

Command.name: Yesterdays Date
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys Format(Now-1, "MMMM d, yyyy" ) End Sub

Command.name: Zoom <Direction>
Command.content: If _arg1="Right" Then SendSystemKeys "{Right 50}" If _arg1="Left" Then SendSystemKeys "{Left 50}" If _arg1="Up" Then SendSystemKeys "{Up 50}" If _arg1="Down" Then SendSystemKeys "{Down 50}"

Command.name: Zoom <In_Out>
Command.content: 'Script copyright Rüdiger Wilke, RW Programs 2015 Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long Const VK_CTRL = 17 Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Select Case ListVar1 Case "In" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA, 0) Case "Out" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA, 0) End Select keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) End Sub

Command.name: Zoom In
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Pad+}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "m" End Sub

Sub Main SendKeys "^+{Right}"
End Sub

Command.name: Localhost
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "https://localhost:7164/" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Mouse Double Click
Command.content: Sub Main 'ShiftKey 2,1 ButtonClick 1,2 'ShiftKey 2,0 End Sub

Command.name: Tab Voice Typing
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{WindowsHold}h" GoToSleep End Sub

Command.name: Tab <1to10> Voice Typing
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim integerCounter as Integer For integerCounter = 1 to ListVar1 SendKeys "{Tab}" Next Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{WindowsHold}h" GoToSleep End Sub

Command.name: Default Box
Command.content: SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+c}" AppBringUp "C:\Users\MPhil\source\repos\SpeechRecognitionHelpers\DictationBoxMSP\bin\Release\net7.0-windows\DictationBoxMSP.exe"

Command.name: Equals <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "= " & ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: Force <dictation>

Sub Main SendKeys ListVar1
Wait 0.2
End Sub

Command.name: List Directory
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "DIR" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Current Directory
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "cd " End Sub

Command.name: Keywords <cSharpKeywords> <cSharpKeywords>
Command.content:
Sub Main
SendKeys "{Space}" & ListVar1 & "{Esc}{Space}" & ListVar2 & "{Esc}{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture Screen To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Prtsc}" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Press Enter
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Enter <lookupvalue>
Command.content:
'#Reference {B691E011-1797-432E-907A-4D8C69339129}#6.1#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\System\ado\msado15.dll#Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects 6.1 Library#ADODB '#Reference {5C486340-2F92-11D1-A47C-00A024A3A678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking15\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main On Error GoTo ErrorHandler 'strDB_Filename="C:\Launch Applications\Data\LaunchApplications.accdb" 'If FileExists(strDB_Filename) Then 'do absolutely nothing 'Else ' MsgBox "This script expects to have an Access Database called and located as follows: " & strDB_Filename ,vbCritical,"ABORTING!" ' End 'End If Dim stringValue As String stringValue= GetValuetoInsert(ListVar1 )
SendKeys stringValue, True
ExitHere: End
ErrorHandler: MsgBox Err.Description,,"IntelliSense script; An Error Has Occurred " & Err.Number Resume ExitHere
End Sub
Public Function GetValuetoInsert(stringLookup As String) As String Dim Connection As ADODB.Connection Dim Recordset As New ADODB.Recordset Dim stringConnectionString As String Set Connection = New ADODB.Connection Connection.ConnectionString =GetConnectionString() Connection.Open Dim stringSQLText As String stringSQLText = "SELECT dbo.[ValuestoInsert].[ValueToInsert] " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " FROM dbo.[ValuestoInsert] " & vbCrLf stringSQLText = stringSQLText & " WHERE (((dbo.[ValuestoInsert].Lookup)='" & stringLookup & "'));" Recordset.Open stringSQLText, Connection If Not Recordset.BOF And Not Recordset.EOF Then 'there is one or more rows returned Recordset.MoveFirst GetValuetoInsert = Recordset![ValuetoInsert] End If Recordset.Close Connection.Close Set Recordset= Nothing Set Connection= Nothing End Function Function FileExists(FileName As String)
On Error Resume Next FileExists = False FileExists = (Dir(FileName) <> "")
End Function

'#Reference #System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" Imports System.Windows.Forms
Sub Main Dim lists(3) lists(0) = "A List 0" lists(1) = "B List 1" lists(2) = "C List 2" lists(3) = "E List 3" Begin Dialog UserDialog 200,120 Text 10,10,180,15,"Please push the OK button" ListBox 10,25,180,60,lists(),.list OKButton 80,90,40,20 End Dialog Dim dlg As UserDialog dlg.list = 2 Dialog dlg ' show dialog (wait for ok) MessageBox.Show("Selected " & dlg.list) Debug.Print dlg.list End Sub

Command.name: Left Down
Command.content:
Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
Sub Main
Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long 'SendKeys "^%{F9}" Wait 0.1 GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates
xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI beep End Sub

Command.name: <screenlocation> <atoz>
Command.content:
'Option Explicit
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Private Type POINTAPI X As Long Y As Long End Type
Private Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long
Sub Main Dim longTop As Long Dim intLeft As Long
Select Case ListVar2 Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two","2","to" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three","3" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","4","for" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five","5" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six","6" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven","7" intLeft= 1650 End Select Select Case ListVar1 Case "Card" longTop= 940 Case "Taskbar" longTop= 1030 Case "Taskbar Right" longTop= 1030 intLeft= intLeft+ 1680 Case "Bastian" longTop= 1000 intLeft= intLeft+ 1680 Case "Sheet Line" longTop=980 Case "Title bar" longTop= 15 Case "Ribbon","Menu" longTop= 85 Case "Debug Tab" longTop= 110 Case "Tab line","Document Heading" longTop= 227 Case "Horizontal Scrollbar" longTop= 987 Case "Tab Page Line" longTop= 256 Case "Menu Right" longTop= 90 intLeft= intLeft+ 1680 End Select ' SetMousePosition 0,LongLeft, longTop SetMousePositionW(0, CLng (intLeft) , longTop) ' HeardWord "mouse","left","click" If ListVar1="Taskbar Right" Then ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Else ButtonClick 1,1 End If ' SetMousePositionW(0, CLng (intLeft+1) , longTop+1) End Sub Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer)
SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: <screen> <atoz> <atoz>
Command.content:
Public Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Public Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" Alias "mouse_event" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 ' left button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 ' left button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 ' middle button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 ' middle button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 ' right button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10 ' right button up
Private Declare Function GetSystemMetrics Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal nIndex As Long) As Long Const SM_CXSCREEN = 0 Const SM_CYSCREEN = 1 Private Const SM_CMONITORS As Long = 80 Public Type RectAPI Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Private Const SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 76 Private Const SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 77 Private Const SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 78 Private Const SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 79 Dim blnDualMonitors As Boolean Dim blnFineTune As Boolean Sub Main ' this script is primarily for the second screen and assumes resolutions as follows screen one 1680 by 1050 ' and screen two 1280 by 1024 (1440 times 900 is what the new screen is) ' trying to make this script also work for the following screen set up which is what it is at home '1280×1024 1280×800
Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim myRect As RectAPI Dim x As Long Dim y As Long Dim lngScreen1Width As Long Dim lngScreen1Height As Long Dim lngScreen2Width As Long Dim lngScreen2Height As Long ' work out if there is a second monitor
blnDualMonitors=MultiMonitors() ' get the number of pixels across and down for the main monitor lngScreen1Width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) lngScreen1Height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) ' MsgBox "multi screens" & blnDualMonitors ' get the number of pixels across for the second screen myRect=GetVirtualDisplayRect() lngScreen2Width= myRect.Right -lngScreen1Width ' work out the height of the second screen based on the width of screens If myRect.Right=2960 Or myRect.Right= 2986 Then lngScreen2Height=1024 ElseIf myRect.Right=2560 Then lngScreen2Height=800 ElseIf myRect.Right=3120 Then lngScreen2Height=900 ElseIf myRect.Right= 3360 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 ElseIf myRect.Right=4640 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 End If ' MsgBox "screen 2 Height " & lngScreen2Height & " myRect.Right: " & myRect.Right ' now need to put the rest into practice from here blnFineTune=False Dim columnLetter as String columnLetter= CStr(ListVar2) Dim rowLetter as String rowLetter=CStr(ListVar3) intLeft=GetScreenCoordinates(columnLetter,1) intTop=GetScreenCoordinates(rowLetter,2) 'Adjustment for old screen if intLeft>lngScreen1Width then intTop=intTop+30 end if Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long ' MsgBox " list of variable values are " & ListVar1 & " " & ListVar2 & " " & ListVar3 'MsgBox "fine tune " & blnFineTune If blnFineTune Then SetMousePosition 2,intLeft,intTop Else Select Case ListVar1 Case "Grid Left","Grid" ,"Arrow Click","Click","Right Click","Double Click","doubleclick","Left" ' If intLeft> lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=lngScreen1Width-1 If intTop> lngScreen1Height Then intTop=lngScreen1Height-1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) ' Where X and Y are in pixel Case "Grid Right" ,"Screen Click" ,"Touch","Double Touch","Right Touch","Right" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width + lngScreen2Width Then intLeft=(lngScreen1Width+lngScreen2Width)-1 If intTop> lngScreen2Height Then intTop=lngScreen2Height-1 'MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width & " lngScreen2Width=" & lngScreen2Width 'MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width & " lngScreen2Width=" & lngScreen2Width SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Case "Drag","Drag Arrow" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI
SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 'mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Screen" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select End If Wait 0.1
Select Case ListVar1 Case "Arrow Click","Click","Screen Click","Touch"
ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Case "Double Click","Double Touch","doubleclick"
ButtonClick 1,2 Case "Right Click","Right Touch" ButtonClick 2,1 End Select
End Sub Function GetScreenCoordinates(s As String,arg As Integer) As Integer Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim pixelBlocks50 As Integer If arg=1 Then Select Case s Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" pixelBlocks50=1 Case "Bravo" pixelBlocks50=2 Case "Charlie" pixelBlocks50=3 Case "Delta" pixelBlocks50=4 Case "Echo" pixelBlocks50=5 Case "Foxtrot" pixelBlocks50=6 Case "Golf" pixelBlocks50=7 Case "Hotel" pixelBlocks50=8 Case "India" pixelBlocks50=9 Case "Juliet" pixelBlocks50= 10 Case "Kilo" pixelBlocks50= 11 Case "Lima" pixelBlocks50= 12 Case "Mike" pixelBlocks50= 13 Case "November" pixelBlocks50= 14 Case "Oscar" pixelBlocks50= 15 Case "Papa" pixelBlocks50= 16 Case "Qubec" pixelBlocks50= 17 Case "Romeo" pixelBlocks50= 18 Case "Sierra" pixelBlocks50= 19 Case "Tango" pixelBlocks50= 20 Case "Uniform" pixelBlocks50= 21 Case "Victor" pixelBlocks50= 22 Case "Whiskey" pixelBlocks50= 23 Case "X-ray" pixelBlocks50= 24 Case "Yankee" pixelBlocks50= 25 Case "Zulu" pixelBlocks50= 26 Case "One","1" pixelBlocks50= 27 Case "Two" pixelBlocks50= 28 Case "Three" pixelBlocks50= 29 Case "Four","For" pixelBlocks50= 30 Case "Five" pixelBlocks50= 31 Case "Six" pixelBlocks50=32 Case "Seven" pixelBlocks50= 33 Case "Eight" pixelBlocks50= 34 Case "Nine" pixelBlocks50= 35 Case "Ten" pixelBlocks50= 36 Case "Eleven" pixelBlocks50= 37 Case "Twelve" pixelBlocks50= 38 Case "Thirteen" pixelBlocks50= 39 Case "Fourteen" pixelBlocks50= 40 Case "Fifteen" pixelBlocks50= 41 Case "Sixteen" pixelBlocks50= 42 Case "Seventeen" pixelBlocks50= 43 Case "Eighteen" pixelBlocks50= 44 Case "Nineteen" pixelBlocks50= 45 Case "Twenty" pixelBlocks50= 46 Case "twenty-one" pixelBlocks50= 47 Case "twenty-two" pixelBlocks50= 48 Case "twenty-three" pixelBlocks50= 49 Case "twenty-four" pixelBlocks50= 50 Case "twenty-five" pixelBlocks50= 51 Case "twenty-six" pixelBlocks50= 52 Case "twenty-seven" pixelBlocks50= 53 Case "twenty-eight" pixelBlocks50= 54 Case "twenty-nine" pixelBlocks50=55 Case "thirty" pixelBlocks50= 56 Case "thirty-one" pixelBlocks50= 57 Case "thirty-two" pixelBlocks50= 58 Case "thirty-three" pixelBlocks50= 59 Case "thirty-four" pixelBlocks50= 60 End Select intLeft= 50*pixelBlocks50 GetScreenCoordinates=intLeft Else Select Case s Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intTop End If End Function
Private Function MultiMonitors() As Boolean MultiMonitors = (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CMONITORS) > 1) End Function
Public Function GetVirtualDisplayRect() As RectAPI With GetVirtualDisplayRect .Left = GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN) .Top = GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN) .Right = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Left .Bottom = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Top End With End Function

Command.name: <Mouse> <Direction> <1to5000>
Command.description: Mouse Up, Down, Left or Right 1 to 1000 pixels
Command.content: Sub Main offset = Val( ListVar3) if ListVar2 = "Up" or ListVar2="Raise" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -offset if ListVar2 = "Down" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, offset if ListVar2 = "Left" then SetMousePosition 2, -offset, 0 if ListVar2 = "Right" then SetMousePosition 2, offset, 0 End Sub

Command.name: Scroll <Direction>
Command.content:
Sub Main
If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}"
End Sub

Command.name: Capitalize <dictation>
Command.description: Will only work in Fulltext application like Microsoft Word and will combine three commands into one
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("\cap that") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("go back") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^y" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}" if ListVar1 = "Deleted Items" then SendKeys "de" if ListVar1 = "Drafts" then SendKeys "dr" if ListVar1 = "Junk E-mail" then SendKeys "ju" if ListVar1 = "Out Box" then SendKeys "ou" if ListVar1 = "In Box" then SendKeys "in" if ListVar1 = "Sent Items" then SendKeys "se" if ListVar1 = "RSS Feeds" then SendKeys "rs" if ListVar1 = "Spam" then SendKeys "spa" SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Home}" End Sub

Command.name: <Color> Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "fc" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Tab}{End}" if ListVar1 = "Brown" then SendKeys "{Left 9}" if ListVar1 = "Red" then SendKeys "{Left 8}" if ListVar1 = "Orange" then SendKeys "{Left 7}" if ListVar1 = "Yellow" then SendKeys "{Left 6}" if ListVar1 = "Green" then SendKeys "{Left 4}" if ListVar1 = "Blue" then SendKeys "{Left 2}" if ListVar1 = "Black" then SendKeys "{Left}" if ListVar1 = "Purple" then SendKeys "" SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: <folders>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Calendar" then SendKeys "^2" if ListVar1 = "Notes" then SendKeys "^5" if ListVar1 = "Tasks" then SendKeys "^4" if ListVar1 = "Journal" then SendKeys "^8" if ListVar1 = "Contacts" then SendKeys "^3" if ListVar1 = "Folder List" then SendKeys "^6" if ListVar1 = "Shortcuts" then SendKeys "^7" if ListVar1 = "Mail" then SendKeys "^1" End Sub

Command.name: Remove Content Control
Command.content:
Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long '--- Hardware key constants And functions --- Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYDOWN As Integer = &H0 Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYUP As Integer = &H2 Public Const VK_APPS As Integer = &H5D '---Applications key on a Microsoft Natural keyboard
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_APPS,0,KEYEVENTF_KEYDOWN ,0) Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_APPS,0,KEYEVENTF_KEYUP ,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys "e" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "e" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Get Webpage in Clipboard
Command.content: '#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.3 Dim longCounter as Long Do on error resume next longCounter=longCounter + 1 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 if Err.Number=0 then exit do MsgBox Err.Description , vbExclamation, "Error " & Err.Number if longCounter> 100 then exit do Loop Dim stringAddress As String stringAddress= Clipboard$() wait 0.2 if Len(stringAddress)=0 then MsgBox stringAddress, vbExclamation, "Aborting" exit sub end if ' stringAddress="https://localhost:44312/SampleRequests/Create?productId=68" Dim stringControllerName As String Dim LocationOfForwardSlash As Integer stringAddress=Mid(stringAddress,23) LocationOfForwardSlash=InStr(stringAddress,"/") Dim action as string If LocationOfForwardSlash>0 Then stringControllerName=Mid(stringAddress, LocationOfForwardSlash +1) stringControllerName= Left(stringControllerName,InStr(stringControllerName ,"/" ) -1) action=Mid(stringAddress,InStr(stringAddress,stringControllerName)+ Len(stringControllerName)+1) If InStr(action,"/")>0 Then action = Left(action,InStr(action,"/")-1) If InStr(action,"?")>0 Then action = Left(action,InStr(action,"?")-1) on error resume next Clipboard stringControllerName & " " & action on error goto 0 ' InputBox ( "Controller:" & stringControllerName & vbcrlf & vbcrlf & "Action:" & action, "Testing",stringControllerName & " " & action) End If End Sub

Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Sub Main
SetMousePositionW 1,405, 180 Wait 0.2 ButtonClick 1, 1 End Sub
Function SetMousePositionW(integerRelative As Integer, integerLeft As Integer, integerTop As Integer) SetCursorPos(CLng(integerLeft),CLng(integerTop))
End Function

Command.name: Change Icons Down
Command.content:
'#Language "WWB-COM"
Option Explicit
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_ALT = &h12 Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800
Sub Main 'If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) 'If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) 'If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) 'If ListVar1 = "ALTERNATE Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry
'Select Case ListVar1 'Case "Up" 'mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) 'Case "Down" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*1 , 0) 'Case "Right" 'mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) 'Case "Left" 'mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) ' End Select keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) End Sub

Command.name: Change Icons Up
Command.content:
'#Language "WWB-COM"
Option Explicit
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_ALT = &h12 Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800
Sub Main 'If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) 'If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) 'If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) 'If ListVar1 = "ALTERNATE Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry
'Select Case ListVar1 'Case "Up" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*1, 0) 'Case "Down" ' mouse_event(MOUSEEVENT F_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*1 , 0) 'Case "Right" 'mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) 'Case "Left" 'mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) ' End Select keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) End Sub

Command.name: Find <NextOrPrevious> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main Dim searchText as String searchText=Trim(ListVar2) SendKeys "^f" & searchText & "%" & IIf(ListVar1="Following","d","u") & "%f{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Switch to Task <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Home}" if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "%s" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "{Down}%s}" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "{Down 2}%s}" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "{Down 3}%s}" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "{Down 4}%s}" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "{Down 5}%s}" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "{Down 6}%s}" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "{Down 7}%s}" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "{Down 8}%s}" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "{Down 9}%s}" End Sub

Command.name: Task <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Home}" if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "%s" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "{Down}%s}" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "{Down 2}%s}" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "{Down 3}%s}" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "{Down 4}%s}" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "{Down 5}%s}" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "{Down 6}%s}" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "{Down 7}%s}" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "{Down 8}%s}" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "{Down 9}%s}" End Sub

Command.name: End Task <1to10>

Command.name: <atoz> <atoz>
Command.content:
Public Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Public Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" Alias "mouse_event" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 ' left button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 ' left button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 ' middle button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 ' middle button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 ' right button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10 ' right button up
Private Declare Function GetSystemMetrics Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal nIndex As Long) As Long Const SM_CXSCREEN = 0 Const SM_CYSCREEN = 1 Private Const SM_CMONITORS As Long = 80 Public Type RectAPI Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Private Const SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 76 Private Const SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 77 Private Const SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 78 Private Const SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 79 Dim blnDualMonitors As Boolean Dim blnFineTune As Boolean Sub Main ' this script is primarily for the second screen and assumes resolutions as follows screen one 1680 by 1050 ' and screen two 1280 by 1024 (1440 times 900 is what the new screen is) ' trying to make this script also work for the following screen set up which is what it is at home '1280×1024 1280×800
Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim myRect As RectAPI Dim x As Long Dim y As Long Dim lngScreen1Width As Long Dim lngScreen1Height As Long Dim lngScreen2Width As Long Dim lngScreen2Height As Long ' work out if there is a second monitor
blnDualMonitors=MultiMonitors() ' get the number of pixels across and down for the main monitor lngScreen1Width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) lngScreen1Height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) ' MsgBox "multi screens" & blnDualMonitors ' get the number of pixels across for the second screen myRect=GetVirtualDisplayRect() lngScreen2Width= myRect.Right -lngScreen1Width ' work out the height of the second screen based on the width of screens If myRect.Right=2960 Or myRect.Right= 2986 Then lngScreen2Height=1024 ElseIf myRect.Right=2560 Then lngScreen2Height=800 ElseIf myRect.Right=3120 Then lngScreen2Height=900 ElseIf myRect.Right= 3360 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 ElseIf myRect.Right=4640 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 End If 'MsgBox "screen 2 Height " & lngScreen2Height & " myRect.Riight: " & myRect.Right ' now need to put the rest into practice from here blnFineTune=False Dim columnLetter as String columnLetter= CStr(ListVar1) Dim rowLetter as String rowLetter=CStr(ListVar2) intLeft=GetScreenCoordinates(columnLetter,1) intTop=GetScreenCoordinates(rowLetter,2) Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long 'MsgBox " list of variable values are " & ListVar1 & " " & ListVar2 & " " & ListVar3 'MsgBox "fine tune " & blnFineTune If blnFineTune Then SetMousePosition 2,intLeft,intTop Else Select Case "Click" Case "Grid Left","Grid" ,"Arrow Click","Click","Right Click","Double Click","doubleclick","Left" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=lngScreen1Width-1 If intTop> lngScreen1Height Then intTop=lngScreen1Height-1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) ' Where X and Y are in pixel Case "Grid Right" ,"Screen Click" ,"Touch","Double Touch","Right Touch","Right" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width + lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=(lngScreen1Width+lngScreen1Width)-1 If intTop> lngScreen2Height Then intTop=lngScreen2Height-1 ' MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Case "Drag","Drag Arrow" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI
SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 'mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Screen" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select End If Wait 0.1
Select Case ListVar1 Case "Arrow Click","Click","Screen Click","Touch"
ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Case "Double Click","Double Touch","doubleclick"
ButtonClick 1,2 Case "Right Click","Right Touch" ButtonClick 2,1 End Select
End Sub Function GetScreenCoordinates(s As String,arg As Integer) As Integer Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer If arg=1 Then Select Case s Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","For" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven" intLeft= 1650 Case "Eight" intLeft= 1700 Case "Nine" intLeft= 1750 Case "Ten" intLeft= 1800 Case "Eleven" intLeft= 1850 Case "Twelve" intLeft= 1900 Case "Thirteen" intLeft= 1950 Case "Fourteen" intLeft= 2000 Case "Fifteen" intLeft= 2050 Case "Sixteen" intLeft= 2100 Case "Seventeen" intLeft= 2150 Case "Eighteen" intLeft= 2200 Case "Nineteen" intLeft= 2250 Case "Twenty" intLeft= 2300 Case "twenty-one" intLeft= 2350 Case "twenty-two" intLeft= 2400 Case "twenty-three" intLeft= 2450 Case "twenty-four" intLeft= 2500 Case "twenty-five" intLeft= 2550 Case "twenty-six" intLeft= 2600 Case "twenty-seven" intLeft= 2650 Case "twenty-eight" intLeft= 2700 Case "twenty-nine" intLeft= 2750 Case "thirty" intLeft= 2800 Case "thirty-one" intLeft= 2850 Case "thirty-two" intLeft= 2900 Case "thirty-three" intLeft= 2950 Case "thirty-four" intLeft= 3000 Case "thirty-five" intLeft= 3050 Case "thirty-six" intLeft= 3100 Case "thirty-seven" intLeft= 3150 Case "thirty-eight" intLeft= 3200 Case "thirty-nine" intLeft= 3250 Case "forty" intLeft= 3300 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intLeft Else Select Case s Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intTop End If End Function
Private Function MultiMonitors() As Boolean MultiMonitors = (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CMONITORS) > 1) End Function
Public Function GetVirtualDisplayRect() As RectAPI With GetVirtualDisplayRect .Left = GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN) .Top = GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN) .Right = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Left .Bottom = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Top End With End Function

SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%pf" SendKeys "%d" if ListVar1="Next" Or ListVar1="Following" Then SendKeys "d" else SendKeys "u" end if SendKeys "%n" SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Remove Attachment
Command.content:
Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long '--- Hardware key constants And functions --- Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYDOWN As Integer = &H0 Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYPRESS As Integer = &H1 Public Const KEYEVENTF_KEYUP As Integer = &H2 Public Const KEYEVENTF_SILENT As Integer = &H4
Public Const VK_LBUTTON As Integer = &H1 '---Left mouse button Public Const VK_RBUTTON As Integer = &H2 '---Right mouse button Public Const VK_CANCEL As Integer = &H3 '---Control-break processing Public Const VK_MBUTTON As Integer = &H4 '---Middle mouse button On a three-button mouse Public Const VK_BACK As Integer = &H8 '---BACKSPACE key Public Const VK_TAB As Integer = &H9 '---TAB key Public Const VK_CLEAR As Integer = &HC '---CLEAR key Public Const VK_RETURN As Integer = &HD '---ENTER key Public Const VK_SHIFT As Integer = &H10 '---SHIFT key Public Const VK_CONTROL As Integer = &H11 '---CTRL key Public Const VK_MENU As Integer = &H12 '---ALT key Public Const VK_PAUSE As Integer = &H13 '---PAUSE key Public Const VK_CAPITAL As Integer = &H14 '---CAPS LOCK key Public Const VK_ESCAPE As Integer = &H1B '---ESC key Public Const VK_SPACE As Integer = &H20 '---SPACEBAR Public Const VK_PRIOR As Integer = &H21 '---PAGE UP key Public Const VK_NEXT As Integer = &H22 '---PAGE DOWN key Public Const VK_END As Integer = &H23 '---END key Public Const VK_HOME As Integer = &H24 '---HOME key Public Const VK_LEFT As Integer = &H25 '---LEFT ARROW key Public Const VK_UP As Integer = &H26 '---UP ARROW key Public Const VK_RIGHT As Integer = &H27 '---RIGHT ARROW key Public Const VK_DOWN As Integer = &H28 '---DOWN ARROW key Public Const VK_SELECT As Integer = &H29 '---SELECT key Public Const VK_EXECUTE As Integer = &H2B '---EXECUTE key Public Const VK_SNAPSHOT As Integer = &H2C '---PRINT SCREEN key Public Const VK_INSERT As Integer = &H2D '---INS key Public Const VK_DELETE As Integer = &H2E '---DEL key Public Const VK_HELP As Integer = &H2F '---HELP key Public Const VK_LWIN As Integer = &H5B '---Left Windows key on a Microsoft Naturalkeyboard Public Const VK_RWIN As Integer = &H5C '---Right Windows key on a Microsoft Natural keyboard Public Const VK_APPS As Integer = &H5D '---Applications key on a Microsoft Natural keyboard Public Const VK_NUMPAD0 As Integer = &H60 '---Numeric keypad 0 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD1 As Integer = &H61 '---Numeric keypad 1 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD2 As Integer = &H62 '---Numeric keypad 2 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD3 As Integer = &H63 '---Numeric keypad 3 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD4 As Integer = &H64 '---Numeric keypad 4 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD5 As Integer = &H65 '---Numeric keypad 5 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD6 As Integer = &H66 '---Numeric keypad 6 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD7 As Integer = &H67 '---Numeric keypad 7 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD8 As Integer = &H68 '---Numeric keypad 8 key Public Const VK_NUMPAD9 As Integer = &H69 '---Numeric keypad 9 key Public Const VK_MULTIPLY As Integer = &H6A '---Multiply key
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_APPS,0,KEYEVENTF_KEYDOWN ,0) Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_APPS,0,KEYEVENTF_KEYUP ,0) ' SendKeys "+{F10}" SendKeys "m" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%r" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%a"
End Sub

'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main Dim integerLine As Integer ' MsgBox ListVar1 , vbInformation, "Testing" If Val(Trim(ListVar2) ) >0 Then on error resume next integerLine=CInt(Trim(ListVar2 )) on error goto 0 Else If Trim(LCase(ListVar2)) ="for" Then integerLine=4 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="to" Then integerLine=2 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="one" Then integerLine=1 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="two" Then integerLine=2 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="three" Then integerLine=3 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="four" Then integerLine=4 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="five" Then integerLine=5 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="six" Then integerLine=6 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="seven" Then integerLine=7 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="eight" Then integerLine=8 ElseIf Trim(LCase(ListVar2) ) ="nine" Then integerLine=9 ElseIf TRIM(LCase(ListVar2))="2 to 2" Then integerLine=222 ElseIf TRIM(LCase(ListVar2))="two to two" Then integerLine=222 end if End If if integerLine>0 Then
SendKeys "^g" Wait 0.1 SendKeys CStr(integerLine) Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" end if
End Sub

Command.name: Select Tag <htmltags>
Command.content:
'#Uses"C:\Users\Public\Documents\KnowBrainerSharedCode.txt" Sub Main SendKeys "^f"' open find box Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%e"' Toggle Use Regular Expressions Dim actualTag as String actualTag=GetHtmlTag(ListVar1 )
Dim hasAClosingTag as Boolean hasAClosingTag=True if actualTag="img" Or actualTag="input" Or actualTag="hr" Or actualTag="br" Then hasAClosingTag=false end if if hasAClosingTag Then SendKeys "<" & actualTag & "[\r\s\S]{+}?/" & actualTag & ">" else SendKeys "<" & actualTag & "[\r\s\S]{+}?/>" end If
End Sub

End Sub

Command.name: <myalphabet> <myalphabet>
Command.content:
Sub Main t2 = Mid$(ListVar1,1,InStr(ListVar1, "\")-1) t3 = Mid$(ListVar2,1,InStr(ListVar2, "\")-1) if t2 = "backslash" Then t2 = "\" if t3 = "backslash" Then t3 = "\"
if t2 = "space" Then t2 = " " if t3 = "space" Then t3 = " "
SendKeys UCase(t2+t3)
End Sub

Command.name: <screen> <atoz> <atoz>
Command.content:
Public Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Public Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" Alias "mouse_event" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 ' left button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 ' left button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 ' middle button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 ' middle button up Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 ' right button down Public Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10 ' right button up
Private Declare Function GetSystemMetrics Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal nIndex As Long) As Long Const SM_CXSCREEN = 0 Const SM_CYSCREEN = 1 Private Const SM_CMONITORS As Long = 80 Public Type RectAPI Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Private Const SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 76 Private Const SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 77 Private Const SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 78 Private Const SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN As Long = 79 Dim blnDualMonitors As Boolean Dim blnFineTune As Boolean Sub Main ' this script is primarily for the second screen and assumes resolutions as follows screen one 1680 by 1050 and screen two 1280 by 1024 (1440 times 900 is what the new screen is) ' trying to make this script also work for the following screen set up which is what it is at home 1280×1024 1280×800
Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer Dim myRect As RectAPI Dim x As Long Dim y As Long Dim lngScreen1Width As Long Dim lngScreen1Height As Long Dim lngScreen2Width As Long Dim lngScreen2Height As Long ' work out if there is a second monitor
blnDualMonitors=MultiMonitors() ' get the number of pixels across and down for the main monitor lngScreen1Width = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXSCREEN) lngScreen1Height = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYSCREEN) 'MsgBox "multi screens" & blnDualMonitors ' get the number of pixels across for the second screen myRect=GetVirtualDisplayRect() lngScreen2Width= myRect.Right -lngScreen1Width ' work out the height of the second screen based on the width of screens If myRect.Right=2960 Or myRect.Right= 2986 Then lngScreen2Height=1024 ElseIf myRect.Right=2560 Then lngScreen2Height=800 ElseIf myRect.Right=3120 Then lngScreen2Height=900 ElseIf myRect.Right= 3360 Then lngScreen2Height= 1050 End If 'MsgBox "screen 2 Height " & lngScreen2Height & " myRect.Riight: " & myRect.Right ' now need to put the rest into practice from here blnFineTune=False Dim columnLetter as String columnLetter= CStr(ListVar2) Dim rowLetter as String rowLetter=CStr(ListVar3) intLeft=GetScreenCoordinates(columnLetter,1) intTop=GetScreenCoordinates(rowLetter,2) Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long 'MsgBox " list of variable values are " & ListVar1 & " " & ListVar2 & " " & ListVar3 'MsgBox "fine tune " & blnFineTune If blnFineTune Then SetMousePosition 2,intLeft,intTop Else Select Case ListVar1 Case "Grid Left","Grid" ,"Arrow Click","Click","Right Click","Double Click","doubleclick","Left" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=lngScreen1Width-1 If intTop> lngScreen1Height Then intTop=lngScreen1Height-1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop)) ' Where X and Y are in pixel Case "Grid Right" ,"Screen Click" ,"Touch","Double Touch","Right Touch","Right" If intLeft> lngScreen1Width + lngScreen1Width Then intLeft=(lngScreen1Width+lngScreen1Width)-1 If intTop> lngScreen2Height Then intTop=lngScreen2Height-1 ' MsgBox "intLeft = " & intLeft & " intTop= " & intTop & " lngScreen1Width=" & lngScreen1Width SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Case "Drag","Drag Arrow" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.1 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop))
' mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Right" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) Wait 0.5 ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 1.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(intLeft),CLng(intTop))
mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Drag Screen" GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Wait 0.5 SetCursorPos(CLng(lngScreen1Width+ intLeft),CLng(intTop)) Wait 0.5 mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select End If Wait 0.1
Select Case ListVar1 Case "Arrow Click","Click","Screen Click","Touch"
ButtonClick 1,1 'Syntax ButtonClick button, count (number of clicks) Case "Double Click","Double Touch","doubleclick"
ButtonClick 1,2 Case "Right Click","Right Touch" ButtonClick 2,1 End Select
End Sub Function GetScreenCoordinates(s As String,arg As Integer) As Integer Dim intLeft As Integer Dim intTop As Integer If arg=1 Then Select Case s Case "Zero" intLeft=5 Case "Alpha" intLeft= 50 Case "Bravo" intLeft= 100 Case "Charlie" intLeft= 150 Case "Delta" intLeft= 200 Case "Echo" intLeft= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intLeft= 300 Case "Golf" intLeft= 350 Case "Hotel" intLeft= 400 Case "India" intLeft= 450 Case "Juliet" intLeft= 500 Case "Kilo" intLeft= 550 Case "Lima" intLeft= 600 Case "Mike" intLeft= 650 Case "November" intLeft= 700 Case "Oscar" intLeft= 750 Case "Papa" intLeft= 800 Case "Qubec" intLeft= 850 Case "Romeo" intLeft= 900 Case "Sierra" intLeft= 950 Case "Tango" intLeft= 1000 Case "Uniform" intLeft= 1050 Case "Victor" intLeft= 1100 Case "Whiskey" intLeft= 1150 Case "X-ray" intLeft= 1200 Case "Yankee" intLeft= 1250 Case "Zulu" intLeft= 1300 Case "One","1" intLeft= 1350 Case "Two" intLeft= 1400 Case "Three" intLeft= 1450 Case "Four","For" intLeft= 1500 Case "Five" intLeft= 1550 Case "Six" intLeft= 1600 Case "Seven" intLeft= 1650 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intLeft Else Select Case s Case "Zero" intTop=5 Case "Alpha" intTop= 50 Case "Bravo" intTop= 100 Case "Charlie" intTop= 150 Case "Delta" intTop= 200 Case "Echo" intTop= 250 Case "Foxtrot" intTop= 300 Case "Golf" intTop= 350 Case "Hotel" intTop= 400 Case "India" intTop= 450 Case "Juliet" intTop= 500 Case "Kilo" intTop= 550 Case "Lima" intTop= 600 Case "Mike" intTop= 650 Case "November" intTop= 700 Case "Oscar" intTop= 750 Case "Papa" intTop= 800 Case "Qubec" intTop= 850 Case "Romeo" intTop= 900 Case "Sierra" intTop= 950 Case "Tango" intTop= 1000 Case "Uniform" intTop= 1050 End Select GetScreenCoordinates=intTop End If End Function
Private Function MultiMonitors() As Boolean MultiMonitors = (GetSystemMetrics(SM_CMONITORS) > 1) End Function
Public Function GetVirtualDisplayRect() As RectAPI With GetVirtualDisplayRect .Left = GetSystemMetrics(SM_XVIRTUALSCREEN) .Top = GetSystemMetrics(SM_YVIRTUALSCREEN) .Right = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CXVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Left .Bottom = GetSystemMetrics(SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN) + .Top End With End Function

Command.name: Position Squad
Command.content:
Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long 'Declare API
Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
Sub Main
Dim z As POINTAPI 'Declare variable Dim xpos As Long, ypos As Long
GetCursorPos z 'Get Coordinates
xpos = CLng(z.x) ypos = CLng(z.y) ListVar1="Right" ListVar2= "Down" If ListVar2 = "Up" Then
Select Case ListVar1 Case "Left" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Right" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Center", "Middle" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select Else Select Case ListVar1 Case "Left" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Right" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI Case "Center", "Middle" mouse_event MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN, xpos, ypos, cButt, dwEI End Select
End If
End Sub

Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long)
Private Declare Function SetCursorPos Lib "User32.dll" (ByVal x As Integer, ByVal y As Integer) As Long Type POINTAPI 'Declare types x As Long y As Long End Type
'

Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTDOWN = &H2 Const MOUSEEVENTF_LEFTUP = &H4 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEDOWN = &H20 Const MOUSEEVENTF_MIDDLEUP = &H40 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTDOWN = &H8 Const MOUSEEVENTF_RIGHTUP = &H10
